Class StringMessageSender

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.keyboardr.glassremote.common.sender.StringMessageSender
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessageSender<String>

    public class StringMessageSender
extends Object
implements MessageSender<String>
    Sends messages as Strings. Messages are separated by '\n' characters.
    Author:
    Joshua Brown
